title: Some Bunny to Love: Man of the Month Club: April
description: Nina and Leo have been friends for as long as they can remember... that is until they find themselves having to maintain a fake relationship. Can they put on this performance with their friendship unscathed or did that kiss change everything?A perfectly sexy, fluffy read full of Easter feels, Some Bunny to Love will have readers rooting for Leo and Nina to go from friends to the lovers they are obviously meant to be.
author: Allie Logan
